Name: fat-griffin-7074
Text: Just tried to cook dinner and somehow managed to set off the smoke alarm instead. Guess I’m a culinary genius in my own smoky way. Someone send help (and maybe takeout).

Comments.Name: almond-ibis-8388
Comments.Text: Hey, happens to the best of us—next time, maybe start with takeout!

Comments.Name: kickass-frog-5084
Comments.Text: Cooking mishaps happen to everyone—at least you’ve got a good story and takeout on the way!
